description.p:
Islamic prayer times (Adhan) and Qur'an application that is highly customizable, free and open source. Muezzin supports many languages, advanced prayer options, shows the weather, sunnah times and many more.
Keywords: Athan, Adhan, Azan, Islam, Muslim, Prayers, times, Muezzin, Salah, Salat, Namaz, Islamic, Hijri, Quran, Qur'an, Koran.
Assalamou Alaykoum brothers/sisters and Ramadan Moubarak once again

ul.li: Prayer times are now shown in the tray menu.
Settings are accessible from the tray menu (suggested by @iFarhaan).
Tray menu is now language aware.
Added a few fonts to the Qur'an reader.
Next prayer is now highlighted [and in bold (suggested by @iFarhaan)].
Fixed error startup message (end of file JSON).
Removed unnecessary modules and lines from package.json.
Fixed the "Enable Adhan" check in settings.

description.p: If there is any problem, please contact me so that I can fix it. If you have any ideas, I'd gladly hear them. Jazzakoum Allahu khairan.
